summary: AN ORDINANCE Relating to the Seattle Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing grant agreements with the State of Washington Interagency Committee for Outdoor Recreation for financial assistance to help develop the Lower Woodland, Judkins, and Riverview Ballfield Projects; increasing the expenditure authority in the Department's 2000 budget; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Cumulative Reserve Subfund, all by three-fourths vote of the City Council.
